column4: hi i just upgraded to karmic koala and i have alot of problems, the first problem i have is the new kernel doesn't load so i'm running the system using the old kernel
what happens with the new kernel? no error messages at all?
it just outputs data i have no understanding of,
no error messages just stuff i'v never experienced before
any chance that they were recorded on /var/log/messages ?
no just seems like the kernel that worked only was recorded, also i can't seem to go into update manager, it says the sources list can't be parsed or something
can you put your sources.list on pastebin?
the contents of /etc/apt/sources.list
victor__? isnt freshclam working?
http://pastebin.com/m4f949078
when i did my distribution upgrade it didn't automatically clean up, the upgrade stopped and i couldn't get back to it
hm.... did you try to finish the upgrade? you could try "sudo apt-get dist-upgrade"
you might have some broken packages
it says it encounters a section with no package header
can you paste the contents of your /etc/apt/sources.list on pastebin? or send it to my on a private message?
http://pastebin.com/m4f949078 here it is
what if you try: "sudo apt-get clean all && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade"
it gives the same error
what is the exact error message?
can i paste 4 lines to your Private Messages
sure
